Akasha Arts.effect: Deal 1-2 times severe Phys damage to all foes.

Double Shot.effect: Deal 2 times light Gun damage to 1 foe.

Dream Needle.effect: Deal weak Gun damage and inflict Sleep (medium odds) to 1 foe.

Kill Rush.effect: Deal 1-3 times light Phys damage to 1 foe.

Myriad Truths.effect: Deal 3 times heavy Almighty damage to all foes.

Neo Cadenza.effect: Restore 50% HP of party and increase attack, defense, and evasion rate.

Power Slash.effect: Deal medium Phys damage to 1 foe.

Swift Strike.effect: Deal 2 to 4 times weak Phys damage to all foes.
